sentences.sContent: The centre is the name for moderate, middle-of-the-road parties and politics, scorned by the doctrinaire and idealist .
sentences.sContent_eng: The centre is the name for moderate, middle-of-the-road parties and politics, scorned by the doctrinaire and idealist .
sentences.sCn: 中间派是用于指温和的，走中间道路的党派和政治，他们受到教条主义者和唯心主义者的藐视。

synos.tran: 教条主义者；空论家，纯理论家

trans.tranCn: 空谈家； 教条主义者
